trans-unit.source: Suspends the running workflow instance when executed.
trans-unit.target: 執行時暫止執行中工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> causes a running workflow instance to pause in running, perhaps to reflect an error condition that requires attention beyond the scope of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> 造成執行中的工作流程執行個體暫停執行，或許是為了反映需要工作流程範圍以外留意的錯誤條件。

trans-unit.source: All the state information for the workflow instance is saved, and will be reinstated when the administrator resumes the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體的所有狀態資訊已儲存，且會在管理員繼續進行工作流程執行個體時重新啟用。

trans-unit.source: You cannot include a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> inside an atomic transaction.
trans-unit.target: 您無法將 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> 納入於不可部分完成的作業 (Atomic Transaction) 內。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表所顯示的是 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `Null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `Null` (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates using the constructor for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>, and other things discussed elsewhere within this type.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例說明使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> 的建構函式，此型別內的其他內容已於他處討論。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Suspend and Terminate SDK sample and is from the SuspendAndTerminateWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 SuspendAndTerminateWorkflow.Designer.cs 檔案中＜暫止與結束 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Suspend and Terminate](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f4dffa58-d01e-44fb-b5a1-3b283d2c4517).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用暫止與終止](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f4dffa58-d01e-44fb-b5a1-3b283d2c4517)。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity" /> class, along with the name for that activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體，以及該活動的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an error message to report to administrators providing the reason for suspension.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要向管理員報告的錯誤訊息，提供暫止的原因。

trans-unit.source: An error message that provides the reason for the workflow instance suspension.
trans-unit.target: 提供工作流程執行個體暫止原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Propagation of this error message is determined by the host (the instance manager or the persistence provider).
trans-unit.target: 這個錯誤訊息的傳用是由主提供者 (執行個體管理員或持續性提供者) 所決定。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates initializing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A> property of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>, and other concepts discussed elsewhere in this type.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例說明初始化 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A> 的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> 屬性，此型別內的其他概念已於他處討論。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Suspend and Terminate SDK sample and is from the SuspendAndTerminateWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 SuspendAndTerminateWorkflow.Designer.cs 檔案中＜暫止與結束 SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Suspend and Terminate](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f4dffa58-d01e-44fb-b5a1-3b283d2c4517).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用暫止與終止](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f4dffa58-d01e-44fb-b5a1-3b283d2c4517)。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 表示目標為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> 屬性的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error" />。
